channel.title: VA-DC MMINDI Reunion 2017
channel.description: MMINDI Old Town Alexandria, VA/Washington DC 2017 Reunion/Birthday Weekend, July 13-17 site information, etc.

item.title: Announcement MMINDI VA-DC 2017 Reunion/Birthday Event
item.description:
Updated: July 10th, 2017:

To be held in Old Town Alexandria, VA/Washington DC, on July 14-17...

TOTAL REWRITE! :-)

PLEASE TAKE A MINUTE TO READ and PASS IT ON!

OLD and NEW FRIENDS making MEMORIES

We have made some changes to our VA/DC Reunion in July 2017.

No Registration fee. No “formal” commitment - however, we would like to know if you are interesting in joining us – see Reunion website and register just to let us know you may be coming.

Are going with our planned organization of the weekend as previously shared; however, it will be “pay as you go.” This means, if you think you might find yourself in the VA/DC area July 14-17 – you can meet up with us wherever we find ourselves but you must let Lisa know you're coming because some of the plans may require/do require resevations (out of curtesy at least) for the places we're meeting.

Please see the updated AGENDA! We have plans updated (updated again) - posted on our FB Group by Lisa. If you're not in the group and want to be in the know, contact LISA or John Q. Also, the FB Group will be more up to date with things than the website after this Monday (10th) due to John Q. being on the road and not as easily able to update it (although he can try).

This “Reunion Website” is being updated to reflect this information. Please let classmates know our new plan. We have created a closed Facebook page for those who will be coming to VA/DC in July so that we can share plans and ideas with each other.

We (have) RETURNED all money to those that have paid anything towards the reunion (if you haven't gotten yours, check with LISA!).

Final note: Lisa is managing T-shirts with donated money and low cost / person for the event. It's a rush so only so many for those who were on the FB group and she'll have just a few extra available. So contact her, like, yesterday, if you haven't told her you want one.

item.title: Registration
item.description:
Register if you know you're coming, but no payment commitment.

This will let us know to add you to the Facebook group if you're not already in it (closed group Lisa created).
 


No Hub House


The Registration Form is open for the VA-DC 2017 MMINDI "Birthday" Reunion. You can click on it here or on the link on the left side. You can see who has registered (i.e. plans to come) on Who Is Coming List.


Registration Details:

  • Submitting this registration will email us your information so that we can contact you to be "in-the-know" with and any all plans that Lisa Thackston is working on.

  • Note: Lisa will be refunding all deposits and payments to date, she's working on that now after getting back her deposits from events she had scheduled.

Any issues or questions email us @MMINDIConnect or to @Lisa Thackston.

item.title: Who-Is-Coming
item.description: The Who Is Coming? page up HERE. If you're planning to come but haven't registered, get on it! Lisa will work out the payment with you for registration and if you've made a deposit deduct it from that.

item.title: Accommodations
item.description:
Accommodations

The reunion has set a block of space at Hotel block: http://www.lorienhotelandspa.com with a link for reservation here for making the reservation online or you can use the phone number info below and say you want the "MMI/NDI Reunion" block.

The hotel is $169/night - they have a wine and cheese thing each evening and are a pet friendly hotel. You can request a pet-free/allergy-free room if needed at booking time. They have fitness 24 hours center, etc. Check out their FAQ. - John Q

Note: See addition details below from the hotel:

  • We offer valet (parking) only, which is $30 a night and allows as much in/out as your guest may need for no additional charge.
  • We offer complimentary wireless throughout the hotel as long as you are Kimpton Karma Member, which is in the link here. This will also give the chance to customize your stay (selecting pillow preferences, newspaper, and tons of other fun stuff!) and also gives you a $10 Raid the Mini Bar card. *note: $12.99 internet fee/24 hours for non-rewards members-JohnQ*
  • The reservations department is available 24 hours a day at 1-877-956-7436. All reservations should be made under the “MMI/NDI Reunion” in order to receive the group rate.

Again, the booking link is here and you can review the Kimpton Hotels Karma Rewards program here.

NOTE: Kimpton Lorien Hotel & Spa block deadline is June 15th.

Block rate: The price of the rooms are *$169.00 until the block is released and then whatever market rate is at the resort.

Oh yea - you can see the walk from Hotel -> Metro:

item.title: Draft Agenda
item.description:
The Registration Link is Up! Go get registered! Updated agenda below.

*subject to change - Updated July 10, 2017

Current Schedule

Additional Details added as it happens but we have an update (see below) from our FB Group (must ask to join it!)

Contact List with Lisa lisathackston@mmindiconnect.com. to make sure you're on the facebook page group where posts will be made about events.

There are no upfront costs now, it will be pay as you go depending on the events scheduled as we figure things out.

  • Anyone interested in helping with the planning, organizing, set-up, etc. please contact Lisa Thackston at lisathackston@mmindiconnect.com.

  • FYI
    -- deposits/registration fees paid will be refunded

Timeline Breakdown

Thursday, July 13th

  • Nothing planned ATM. Pending informal get together. Most everyone now arriving Friday instead.

  • Hotel: Accomodations Still Here! this is block of rooms within walking distance of the Metro. Deadline was June 15 for this great price and location in Old Alexandria. Could call and if they still have the 3 day deal with the 3rd day free, that's how John Q. got a better discount than the original deal for his boys to have their own room (they're adults... just not drinking age... yet... OMG says John).

Friday, July 14th
  • Starting Friday (7/14) - meeting at NOT...Fiona's Irish Pub - time 7pm This would be a great time to meet up/check up and work on coordinating more weekend plans together. Actually, it's probably not Fiona's and possibly Theismanns (walking distance). Check FB Site.... for last minute changes!
Saturday, July 15th
  • Planning Event - Lisa says on FB: "I hope to visit the John Paul II Shrine in DC - beyond that - footloose and fancy-free! In the evening... dinner at Landini Brothers - we WOULD HAVE TO MAKE A RESERVATION - so please let me (Lisa) know if you plan to attend - let's say 7pm - or whenever you all agree works best." Dinner at local Landini Brothers Italian Restaurant
Sunday, July 16th

  • Planning Event - John says Lynda organizing walk/run before Brunch (weather permitting), then: Lisa says on FB: "Brunch at Virtue Feed & Grain (also Old Town Alexandria - near the water) - again - what time? 11:30? noon? earlier? later? We should likely let this location know we are coming as well - so let us know if you can join us! OR - have another idea!"

  • "Please chime in and let us all hear what you are thinking/planning. Our fun very informal times together are the best - and we can just go with the flow - however, if we do want to try to hit one spot as a whole group - we should get a head count and let them know (don't want to scare them! :-) ).

  • "Can't wait to see everyone!! XO" - Lisa

Monday, July 17th
  • Most everyone gone, John Q. will be leaving this morning to hit the road (2 day drive back to Louisiana), most everyone else I (John) think will be leaving Sunday. Plans to hit ATL for lunch though (early) at Sean Rowe's Pizza place(s) (NDI Class '86). Anyone around ATL, would love to have them join John Q. there (have to figure out which of his two... three?) places (St. Angelo's Pizza) on Tuesday (early lunch 11ish).
